alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Mesa (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued February 22 at 3:42PM MST until February 22 at 4:15PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Junction has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... North central Mesa County in west central Colorado... South central Garfield County in west central Colorado... * Until 415 PM MST. * At 342 PM MST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of De Beque to near Palisade, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Intense bursts of heavy snow. Gusty winds leading to blowing snow and rapidly falling visibility. Wind gusts greater than 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Travel will become difficult and potentially dangerous within minutes. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 44 and 80. Colorado 65 between mile markers 49 and 61. Locations impacted include... Parachute, Collbran, De Beque, Mesa, Battlement Mesa, Cameo and Molina. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow Down! Rapid changes in visibility and road conditions are expected with this dangerous snow squall. Be alert for sudden whiteout conditions. SNOW SQUALL...RADAR INDICATED
